prefs-showtime: Section heading for Player in the BlueSpice preferences
bs-showtime-file-does-not-exist: Error message shown instead of player when the embedded file does not exist
bs-showtime-tag-showtime-desc: Description of the tag for insert magic
bs-showtime-unsupported-type: Error message shown instead of player when the embedded file has an unsupported file type.
bs-showtime-config-prefwidth: Description of a configuration variable that sets the default width for videos
bs-showtime-config-prefheight: Description of a configuration variable that sets the default height for videos
